field.name: summary
field.value: Algorithm to print error message in ProxyGenerator.CreateClassProxyInstance doesn't test for null arguments

field.name: description
field.value: When ProxyGenerator.CreateClassProxyInstance is called and the MissingMethodException is caught, an error message is built. This message building code doesn't account for the fact that an argument in constructorArguments may be null, and a NullReferenceException is then thrown on `message.AppendLine(argument.GetType().ToString())`.

comment.author: Rory.Plaire
comment.text: That was the fastest bug patch-apply I have ever seen!
